title: Sales, IP and Champions
body: Just got started playing LoL again and I'm planning on buying a few champions. I noticed the sale feature reduces the RP price only but not the IP price. Why is this, and is there ever a chance the IP price might reduce for some champions? Thanks.

replies.body: they do this becuase rito wants that mula ( money ) since u get ip everytime ur in a game evne if u lose or win so no point in lower ip. and if u see pros who have all champs, all runes maxeverything etc. they have over like 10k ip.

Over 10k? They have easily hundreds of thousands bud, in some case millions.

Picture a new champion for 7800 ip. Add the price of Yi to that. That is 10k. I pros have about 60 times that amount if not millions.

Actually they are just wiping their asses with money they just have the desire to enrich themselves further but I don't blame em if I owned their company I would just make you pay to respawn.

Here's a link to the official schedule:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083304-Permanent-Champion-Price-Reduction

It's a slow process especially considering that champs aren't released very often.
IP is so easy to get thats why its more than real money.
They do have an IP reduction schedule somewhere on this site. Can't quite rememver where and can't be bothered looking for it.
They should atleast make champs gift able through ip so I can help my lower level friends get into the game

They should make it half price for ip too I say it makes it really hard for low level players to love the game, especially now they introduced the hextech crafting which you can only get a crate or key if you own the champion, I mean free champion rotation is good and all but it's just not enough, I realised how annoying this actually was when I recently started playing on my level 15 smurf
